DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase I, randomized, placebo-controlled, double-blind, dose-escalation study of single and repeat doses of rhuMAb IFNalpha, administered through the SC or IV route, in adults with Systemic Lupus Erythematosus.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of rhuMAb IFNalpha in Adults With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
